title: First-run detection and setup prompt
description: Detect when config.json is missing and prompt user to run setup before starting Ralph loop.

acceptanceCriteria.text: If config.json missing, show welcome message and offer setup
Support --skip-setup / -y flag to use defaults without prompting
Create minimal config.json with defaults if user skips setup
Call ralph-config if user accepts setup
Integrate check into main ralph() function before loop starts
